label: 獅子
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: Fabulous beasts resembling lions that form part of the Chinese animal iconography, shishi appear in paris as temple or shrine guardians and as motifs on textiles and mirrors in the Shôsô-in. Shishi masks in the Respository were worn for performing the lion dance. [正倉院]
